helpText: ı_Edit, delete, or reorder categories in your organization______________________________İ.

generic.title: ı_Error updating categories__________________________İ
generic.message: ı_Something went wrong. Please try again later________________________İ.

maxDepthExceeded.title: ı_Error updating categories__________________________İ
maxDepthExceeded.message: ı_You cannot nest categories more than 2 levels deep___________________________İ.

destinationHasSameName.title: ı_Error updating categories__________________________İ
destinationHasSameName.message: ı_A category with the same name already exists in the destination category______________________________________İ.

noSchema.title: ı_Schema not found_________________İ
noSchema.message: ı_Item schema not found for user_________________İ.

maxCharacter.title: ı_Error updating categories__________________________İ
maxCharacter.message: ı_Category names can be a maximum of ${maxCharacter} characters long___________________________________İ.

deleteInUseCategory.title: ı_Delete category________________İ
deleteInUseCategory.message: ı_${numItem} items are assigned to this category. Deleting the category will also remove it from these items_______________________________________________________İ.

custom.title: ı_Custom categories__________________İ
custom.message: ı_Create your own categories to organize content within your organization_____________________________________İ.

arcgis.title: ı_ArcGIS categories__________________İ
arcgis.message: ı_ArcGIS categories include a selection of topic categories and subcategories that can be used to categorize many types of geospatial content. These categories are used to support ArcGIS Living Atlas of the World___________________________________________________________________________________________________________İ.

iso.title: ı_ISO categories_______________İ
iso.message: ı_ISO categories includes topic categories from the International Organization for Standardization that provide a method for describing and cataloging geographic information_______________________________________________________________________________________İ.

inspire.title: ı_INSPIRE categories___________________İ
inspire.message: ı_INSPIRE categories include a comprehensive set of spatial data themes set out in the INSPIRE Directive_____________________________________________________İ.
